overview: There were stories of a nearly 15 foot long fish-like creature prowling in the shallows near Smeviken. Some claimed to nearly have caught the beast but there is not evidence of anyone succeeding. Now in 2020 it's time for a new attempt to capture the legendary beast.
tagline: It came during plague, war and difficult times to feed. Now it's back again in Corona times.
title: The Beast Beneath Lake Bullaren
